body.p:
Prison No (4)
Lexington Ky --
Sept_ 5th 1865
His Excelency
Gov -- T. E. Bramlett.

Sir we the undersigned Soldiers of Ky_Vols Avail ourselves of the present opportunity of returning to you our greatful thanks for the many favor confered on us by sending to our assistance Col. Morrill. we believe that he is a Gentleman in the fullest sense of the term, and will do all he can for us in our present troubles.

we remain -- Sir
your Obe,'t Servt,'s
George Crumb
F. Miller
D, Peddicord
T. B. Edwards --
John Knoehelman
H. R Talls
Speed Steele
Charly McClain
